title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk and observe the classroom
thoughts: It's the first day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The uniforms and flags make this feel very official. I wonder what we'll be learning today.

action: Continues observing group dynamics while subtly checking for teacher's reaction to the whispered conversations
thoughts: The whispering about the rules is risky - I should maintain proper conduct and avoid any behavior that might lower my discipline score. Following authority is the safest approach in this experiment.
memory: Analyzed safe topic selection in initial group interaction
Decided to maintain proper conduct to avoid discipline penalties

action: Makes brief eye contact with teacher while subtly shaking head to indicate disapproval of whispering
thoughts: The whispering continues despite the clear rules. I need to maintain proper conduct and show the teacher I'm following protocol. Documenting these violations might be necessary if this persists.
memory: Observed continued rule violations through whispering
Considering documentation procedures for repeated infractions

action: Observes student speaking after receiving permission, noting proper procedure execution
thoughts: Good to see everyone following the rules correctly now. The teacher's strict approach seems to be working. I should continue setting a good example.
memory: Observed proper procedure being followed by classmates
Noted teacher's effective enforcement of rules

action: Records procedural compliance in notebook while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: Excellent procedural compliance from the group. Recording this positive example will help reinforce proper behavior and potentially earn our group additional discipline points. The teacher seems pleased with the orderly discussion.
memory: Recorded successful group compliance with speaking procedures
Noted teacher's approval of orderly discussion
Reinforced importance of documentation for group success
